dataGasPerBlob.d: The base fee for data gas per blob

targetDataGasPerBlock.d: The target data gas consumed per block

maxDataGasPerBlock.d: The max data gas allowable per block

dataGasPriceUpdateFraction.d: The denominator used in the exponential when calculating a data gas price

simpleGasPerBlob.d: The basic gas fee for each blob

minDataGasPrice.d: The minimum fee per data gas

kzgPointEvaluationGasPrecompilePrice.d: The fee associated with the point evaluation precompile

blobCommitmentVersionKzg.d: The number indicated a versioned hash is a KZG commitment

blsModulus.d: The BLS modulus that is the upper bound of the finite field in which the point precompile evaluates points
